text: I govoril Musa daleye: "Daruy nam v etom mire khoroshuyu zhizn' i naprav' nas na blagiye deyaniya i povinoveniye Tebe, i poshli nam v posledney zhizni dobruyu nagradu i miloserdiye! My k Tebe obratilis' s raskayaniyem i prosim proshcheniya". I Gospod' skazal yemu: "Moim nakazaniyem YA porazhayu, kogo zhelayu iz tekh, kotoryye ne raskayalis', a milost' Moya ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch' - vso sushcheye. YA predpishu yeyo tem, kotoryye bogoboyaznenny iz tvoyego naroda, kotoryye izbegayut grekhov, dayut naznachennoye ochishcheniye (zakyat) i veruyut vo vse Pisaniya, nisposlannyye Nami
